title: Sautéed Snow Peas, Sugar Snap Peas, and Pea Shoots
directions: Heat oil in a large, shallow pan over high heat. Cook garlic 30 seconds, stirring to prevent burning. Combine stock and oyster sauce in a bowl; add to pan. Add peas; cook, turning peas constantly, until bright green and crisp, about 2 minutes. Divide among 8 bowls; top each with a handful of pea shoots.
ingredients: 4 cups sugar snap peas, strings removed
